entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
